comment.author: 67127882@N07
comment._content:
The Press conference at Government House in March 1961, following the Constitutional Conference.  From left to right: Mr Julius K Nyerere, President of TANU; H E Sir Richard Turnbull, KCMG, Governor of Tanganyika; the Rt. Hon. Iain Macleod, the British Secretary of State for the Colonies; The Hon A Y A Karimjee, the Speaker of the Legislative Council; extreme right Mr Pius Msekwa, the Clerk to the Legislative Council. 
, :
